title: Republic of Congo: Improving the Management of Produced, Human and Natural Capital to Raise Living Standards
description: BRAZZAVILLE, September 23, 2025 - The Congolese economy posted modest real GDP growth of 2.6% in 2024, marking a moderate increase in per capita income for the first time since 2016. This finding, according to the World Bank's new Economic Update for the Republic of Congo, underscores that the progr...
